Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Cornell Drive
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Stony Island, Marquette and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near 67th/Cornell Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Stony Island, Marquette and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near 67th/Cornell Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Vincennes
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Vincennes, 86th PL., Halsted, and 87th, due to street blockage near 87th/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Vincennes, 86th PL., Halsted, and 87th, due to street blockage near 87th/Vincennes.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed
ShortDescription: Orange Line service experiencing delays due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line service is experiencing delays due to track conditions.

Shuttle buses are available between Midway and the Loop, downtown.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Rosemont
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
